ThinkPad A485 (14") Laptop

ThinkPad A485 (14") Laptop

Raise the bar for business-class

  • 14" laptop is lightweight, easy to carry without sacrificing on performance
  • Latest AMD Ryzen™ Pro processing and Radeon™ Vega™ graphics for multitasking
  • Biometric and encryption security to protect critical data

Sorry, this product is no longer available

Unfortunately the "ThinkPad A485 (14") Laptop" is no longer available, may we suggest:

A485 (14")
TOP
  • Features
  • Tech Specs
  • Top Accessories
  • Services

Raise the bar for business-class

  • Features

    Features

    An IT admin's dream

    Lightweight with legendary durability, the ThinkPad A485 also ensures a high level of enterprise-grade protection, featuring robust biometric security and data encryption. With improved serviceability, you get easy access to internal hardware components to upgrade your system. There’s even a Diagnostic SmartBeep tool to help with remote troubleshooting and faster service. When it comes to IT, we've got you covered.

    Thwart would-be hackers

    We know how much you value your data—and your privacy. That’s why the ThinkPad A485 offers processor-level security features to keep your data safe. Windows Hello uses biometric sensors to recognize you, so when you unlock your device with your fingerprint, you get superior enterprise-grade protection. The ThinkShutter is a built-in webcam cover that comes standard to protect your privacy when you do not want your camera on. Additionally, Discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) encrypts all of your data—including passwords.

    Let your creativity flag fly

    With the amazing new AMD Radeon™ Vega graphics, visuals are more lifelike, colors more vibrant. And whether you're creating content, gaming, or streaming, you can do it all without lag time.

    Audio so amazing you’ll think it’s live

    Speakers on the ThinkPad A485 deliver amazing audio with Dolby Audio™ Premium, which energizes your entertainment with rich, powerful sound. It dynamically adjusts audio to deliver home theater quality in a virtual surround sound experience for all your entertainment. Boosted bass and enhanced volume turn it all up for sound that’s loud and clear enough to share.

    Oh snap!

    The ThinkPad A485 integrates with the ThinkPad Pro Dock (sold separately), a capability that’s shared across most of the 2018 ThinkPad models. The new USB-C side mechanical dock easily connects and automatically levels your device. Once docked, your ThinkPad stays securely in place and sits at a slightly tilted, ergonomic keyboard angle for comfort.

    Show More
    Less

  • Tech Specs

    Tech Specs

    Description Specifications
    Processor
    ?The processor runs the operating system and all applications. The faster the processor, the faster your programs run, but battery life can be affected.
    		 Up to AMD Ryzen™ 7 Pro 2700U Processor (2.20GHz, up to 3.8GHz Max Boost, 4MB Cache)
    Operating System
    • Windows 10 Home
    • Windows 10 Pro – Lenovo recommends Windows 10 Pro 
    Display
    ?The display is the screen. Higher resolutions displays allow you to fit more content on the screen at once. IPS displays offer better colour and wider viewing angles.
    • 14" HD (1366 x 768) anti-glare
    • 14" FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS anti-glare
    • 14" FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS multi-touch anti-glare
    Graphics Up to Integrated Radeon™ Vega 10 Graphics
    Camera
    720p HD camera
    Memory
    ?Memory, aka RAM, is used to store data temporarily as you are actively working on your laptop. It is not where your data is permanently stored. More memory can help your system run faster, especially if you have a lot of programs open at the same time.
    		 Up to 32 GB DDR4 2400 MHz
    Storage
    ?Storage is where data, like documents and applications, resides permanently on your computer. Not to be confused with memory, which is only active when the computer is in use. Larger files like media files will need larger storage.
    • 500 GB 7200 RPM
    • Up to 512 GB PCIe SSD OPAL 2.0
    Battery Up to 10.7 hours of battery life with 48 Whr
    *Based on testing with MobileMark 2014. Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage, & other factors
    Audio
    • Stereo speakers with Dolby Audio Premium
    • Dual-array (noise-cancelling) microphones
    Security
    • Discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) 2.0
    • Match-on-chip touch fingerprint reader (optional)
    • ThinkShutter privacy cover
    • Smart card reader (optional)
    Connectivity
    ?Wireless comes down to B, G, N or AC. The basics are B and G, G being faster than B with more range. AC is the fastest, but N has the furthest range and more frequency options.
    		 802.11 AC (2 x 2) + Bluetooth® 4.1
    Ports
    • 1 x USB 3.1 Gen 2**
    • 1 x USB 3.1 Gen 1** (one Always On)
    • 2 x USB 3.1 Gen 1** Type-C (PowerDelivery, DisplayPort, Data transfer)
    • HDMI 2.0
    • DisplayPort 1.4 via USB-C
    • Headphone/mic combo jack
    • Ethernet RJ45
    • USB-C side mechanical docking port
    • 4-in-1 card reader
    Dimensions (W x D x H) 13.2" x 9.1" x .78" / 336.6 x 232.5 x 19.95 (mm)
    Weight Starting at 3.63 lbs (1.65 kg)

    Specifications may vary depending upon region.

    ** The actual transfer speed of the USB 3.1 [Gen 2] will vary and, depending on many factors, such as the processing capability of host and peripheral devices, file attributes and other factors related to system configuration and your operating environments, will be slower than a speed of [10 Gbit/s]

    Ports/Interfaces

    Right

    • 1. Headphone/mic combo jack
    • 2. USB 3.1 Gen 2
    • 3. HDMI
    • 4. USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Always on)
    • 5. Ethernet RJ45
    • 6. 4-in-1 card reader
    • 7. Kensington® lock slot

    Left

    • 8. USB-C
    • 9. USB-C side mechanical docking port
    • 10. Smart card reader (optional)

    Less

  • Services

    Services

    Lenovo offers a comprehensive portfolio of services to support and protect your ThinkPad investment—so you can focus on your business, not your IT.

    Premier Support

    Bypass phone menus and scripted troubleshooting to access advanced-level technicians with the expertise needed to quickly diagnose and solve problems.

    Accidental Damage Protection (ADP)

    Protect your investment from operational or structural damage caused by common accidents like drops, spills, or electrical surges. This fixed-cost, fixed-term protection plan minimizes unexpected repairs for predictable budgeting and provides significant savings relative to the cost of non-covered repairs.

    Warranty Extensions

    Get a fixed-term, fixed-price service solution to match the lifecycle of your device and fit within your budget. Choose from a range of solutions, including next business day on-site, 9x5x4, and 24x7 response time windows. Purchasing an extension at the time of a system purchase saves 15-30% over the price of purchasing it post-warranty.

The purchase quantity of the product has reached the upper limit.

Convenient Payment Options

Consumers Only: Lenovo.com sells and ships products to end-user customers only. Lenovo may cancel your order if we suspect you are purchasing products for resale.

Limits: Limit 5 per customer. Offers valid from Lenovo in the US only. Lenovo may increase or decrease these limits, from time to time, for certain offerings.

Ship date: Shipping times listed are estimates based on production time and product availability. An estimated ship date will be posted on our order status site after your order is placed. Ship dates do not include delivery times which will vary depending on the delivery method selected at checkout. Lenovo is not responsible for delays outside of our immediate control, including delays related to order processing, credit issues, inclement weather, or unexpected increase in demand. To obtain the latest information about the availability of a specific part number, please call the phone number listed in the masthead at the top of this page.

Same Day Shipping: Products ship within the same business day (excl. bank holidays and weekends) for orders which have been placed prior to 3pm ET and which are prepaid in full or payment approved. Limited quantities are available. Software and accessories will be shipped separately and may have a different estimated ship date.

Availability: Offers, prices, specifications and availability may change without notice. Lenovo will contact you and cancel your order if the product becomes unavailable or if there was a pricing or typographic error. Products advertised may be subject to limited availability, depending on inventory levels and demand. Lenovo strives to provide a reasonable quantity of products to accommodate estimated consumer demand.

General: Review key information provided by Microsoft that may apply to your system purchase, including details on Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, and potential upgrades/downgrades. Lenovo makes no representation or warranty regarding third-party products or services.

Trademarks: Lenovo, ThinkPad, ThinkCentre, ThinkStation and the Lenovo logo are trademarks of Lenovo. Microsoft, Windows, Windows NT, and the Windows logo are trademarks of Microsoft Corporation. Ultrabook, Celeron, Celeron Inside, Core Inside, Intel, Intel Logo, Intel Atom, Intel Atom Inside, Intel Core, Intel Inside, Intel Inside Logo, Intel vPro, Itanium, Itanium Inside, Pentium, Pentium Inside, vPro Inside, Xeon, Xeon Phi, and Xeon Inside are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries. Other company, product or service names may be trademarks or service marks of others.

Warranty: For a copy of applicable warranties, write to: Lenovo Warranty Information, 1009 Think Place, Morrisville, NC, 27560. Lenovo makes no representation or warranty regarding third party products or services. The Lenovo Limited Warranty applies only to Lenovo hardware products purchased for your own use, and does not transfer upon resale.

Battery: These systems do not support batteries that are not genuine Lenovo-made or authorized. Systems will continue to boot, but may not charge unauthorized batteries. Attention: Lenovo has no responsibility for the performance or safety of unauthorized batteries, and provides no warranties for failures or damage arising out of their use. Battery life (and recharge times) will vary based on many factors, including system settings and usage.

Pricing: Does not include tax, shipping and handling, or recycling fees. Reseller prices may vary. Savings referenced off regular Lenovo web prices.

Windows 10 Upgrade from Microsoft: Offer is available for qualified Windows 7 and Windows 8.1 devices (including devices you already own). Please visit www.windows.com/windows10upgrade for the complete terms and conditions regarding this offer and to check your eligibility. This upgrade is being offered by Microsoft.

Same Day Shipping

Products ship within the same business day (excl. bank holidays and weekends) for orders which have been placed prior to 3pm ET and which are prepaid in full or payment approved. Limited quantities are available.

Software and accessories will be shipped separately and may have a different estimated ship date.
